summary: FAULTY INTAKE MANIFOLD ON 1998 OLDSMOBILE SILHOUETTE HAS CAUSED AN ENGINE FAILURE.  THIS FAILURE OCCURRED WHILE MY PREGNANT WIFE (3 DAYS PAST DUE) WAS DRIVING OUR 5 YR OLD SON HOME FROM THE DENTIST.  SHE WAS DRIVING 40 MPH ON A HIGH TRAFFIC ROAD WHEN THE ENGINE FAILED!  THIS SUDDEN ENGINE FAILURE COULD HAVE CAUSED A SERIOUS ACCIDENT. *JB
